title: What happened to the Aztec civilization? - Quora

response.answer_text: It was reorganized into a huge colony by the Spaniards. Today most Mexicans ignore the fact that during the colony and early republican times, most of the territories that had belonged to the Aztec Empire became a province, the Province of Mexico in the colony, and Mexico State in the republic. Thoughout the nineteenth century, the formerly huge Mexico State was broken down and new states like Puebla, Guerrero, Oaxaca, Morelos and parts of Michoacan were created. Since Mexico State was so huge and most of he country’s population lived there, liberal politicians saw it as a huge concentration of voters and political power, which was seen as a distinct and potential political disadvantage because of the number of voters.
